title: I can't post on boards
body: I want to post a concept of mine and it won't work. I keeps saying that I have to chose a board but in a the chose a Board option, there is no boards.

replies.body: Try visiting the [Concepts & Creations boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts), then create a discussion there about your concept. Let me know if you continue to run into issues with this.
